title: skin preview
body: who can help me i installed skin preview the newest version but when i open it it's showing me the free rotation that was last week and when i try to use skins i cant and i folowed what i had to do step by step who can help me?

replies.body: We don't support use of third party programs or modifications, and unfortunately won't be able to assist with this.  Using these is at your own risk, and can cause some major stability issues with your game.  You can review our stance on[ third parties here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications).  I can only recommend playing the game normally without the use of outside sources.
